2094650.name: Hopeless
2094650.description:
Drive a locomotive full of survivors through a hostile post-apocalypse that changes with each attempt and find a new home. Can you escape the heat of the sunlight?

In this Rogue-like dice game, you must take your luck into your own hands, flip the dice in your favor and upgrade your locomotive to withstand the perils of your journey. Develop your own strategy to ensure your passengers' survival and trade with colonies you encounter along the way. Burn the cubes at the right moment to power your engine.

Choose your route and play with different unlockable trains that provide different playstyles and abilities.

Can you help the passengers to find a new home? The way will not be easy!



Features:

- Discover a grim world plagued by climate change
- Unlock new engines
- Every attempt is different
- Develop a strategy to get the most out of your dice
- Beautiful atmosphere
